definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: overflow, rinse or wash off (NH id., so JAram. [[שְׁטַף]]; As. šatâpu, overflow, Ar. st.f id., Cuche);—

overflow, of river Is 8:8, Je 47:2 a (v. [[נַחַל]]), Da 11:10, Da 11:40, all fig. of invading army, cf. Is 28:15 (qy. by Sta:ThLz, Apr. 1894, 235, Du Marti rd. [[שׁוֹט שׁׂטֵט]]), v:Is 28:18 (v. [[שׁוֹט]]), also (sim. of ´[[י]]: in judgment) v:Is 28:2 ([[מַיִם]]), Is 30:28, of judicial destruction, [[שׁוֹטֵף חְדָקָה]] Is 10:22; c. acc. of land Je 47:2, pers. (fig.) Is 43:2 ([[נְהָרוֹת]]), Ps 69:3 ([[שִׁבּׂלֶת]]), v:Ps 69:16 ([[מִיִם]] ´[[שׁ]]:), Ps 124:4 ([[מַיִם]]), cf. Is 28:17 Ct So 8:7; [[גֶּשֶׁם]] [[שׁוֹטֵף]] flooding rain (of ´[[י]]:’s judgement) Ez Eze 11:11, Eze 11:13, Eze 38:22; [[נַחַל שׁוֹטֵף]] Is 66:12, sim., in good sense.—Abs. Da 11:26 v.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: —Fig. of dashing, rushing horse, [[בַּמִּלְחָמָה]] ´[[כְּסוּס שׁוֹ]]: Je 8:6.
lit., rinse or wash off, c. acc. of thing washed 1Ki 22:38, [[יׇדָיו]] [[בַּמָָּיִם]] Le 15:11 (P); of stain Ez Eze 16:9 ([[מֵעָלַיִךְ]]; ‖[[רָחַץ ]]); [[עֲפַר־אָָרֶץ]] Job 14:19.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִשָּׁטֵף בַּמַּיִם]] Le 15:12 be rinsed out, off (P; of wooden vessel); 3 mpl. [[יִשָּֽׁטְפוּ מִלְּפָנׇיו]] Da 11:22 be swept away (defeated), read prob. [[יִשָּׁטֵף]] (for [[יִשְׁטׂף]]), also v:Da 11:26 (cf. Dr).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3ms. [[וּמׂרַק וְּשֻׁטַּף בַּמָָּיִם]] Le 6:21 (P) it shall be scoured and rinsed.
